text: Ni tachichinjidwa awala wawan’jogwepe M’mbuje gwao (Allah) wa ku Mbepo ali mikutula-mikutula, mpaka pandema jatachijiyika, ni jichiugulidwa milango jakwe (wanganyao nkanakopochele), ni tachasalila wanganyao akujichengeta wakwe (mwakwakalibuchisya): “Ntendele uwe kukwenu! M’bele wambone (pa itendo ni iwecheto yenu, mwanti sengwagani), basi jijinjilani (Mbepo), tim’be wandamo (mwalakwemo).”
